# Openshift Labs

- [Click Here to Download OC CLI Tool](https://mirror.openshift.com/pub/openshift-v4/clients/ocp/4.1.4)

To login using CLI

oc login <Instructor given URL starts with -> https://api.cluster-...> -u user# -p r3dh4t1!

user# example: user2
